title: Jug And Stopper, "All Union Agricultural Exhibition", 1939
markings: Marks: On underside: Dmitrov mark stamped in blue overglaze
provenance: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection
creditline: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection; Partial gift and partial purchase through the Decorative Arts Association Acquisition and Smithsonian Collections Acquisition Program Funds
description: Long tapered neck, bulbous body, flared foot; loop handle; lid with large ovoid finial. Painted with Soviet Emblem of girl and boy holding wheat sheaf aloft and inscription (in Russian); blue border at lower edge and lid painted blue.

tombstone.epitaph:
Jug And Stopper, "All Union Agricultural Exhibition", 1939.
1939. Porcelain, enamel, gilding. The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection; Partial gift and partial purchase through the Decorative Arts Association Acquisition and Smithsonian Collections Acquisition Program Funds. 1989-41-95-a,b.
